comment._content: Edward E. McCall was supported by the Tammany Hall political machine in New York City: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=F40B12FD395B13...

comment._content: He was head of the New York Public Service Commission, which had jurisdiction over the subways, at this time.
